org.epics.pvData.factory
Class AbstractPVArray

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.pvData.factory.AbstractPVField
      org.epics.pvData.factory.AbstractPVArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
PVArray, PVField, Requester, Serializable, SerializableArray
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasePVBooleanArray, BasePVByteArray, BasePVDoubleArray, BasePVFloatArray, BasePVIntArray, BasePVLongArray, BasePVShortArray, BasePVStringArray
public abstract class AbstractPVArray
extends AbstractPVField
implements PVArray

Abstract base class for any PVArray field. Any code that implements a PVArray field for an IOC database should extend this class.

Author:
mrk
